derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French sege, from asegier 'besiege'

encyclopedia.content: Siege是一个多线程http负载测试和基准测试工具。 Siege：这是Linux系统下的一个测试工具，完全使用C语言实现，可以对HTTP和FTP服务器进行负载和性能测试。通过使用Siege 提供的功能，可以很容易的制定测试计划：包括规定使用并发用户数、重复数量，从而可以模拟在服务器、网络或者其它对象上附加负载以测试他们提供服务的受压能力，方便的测试服务器的性能。最后，利用Siege提供的测试结果来分析性能指标或者分析他们提供的服务在

entry.tran: (军队或警察对某地的)围困，包围，围攻
entry.def: A siege is a military or police operation in which soldiers or police surround a place in order to force the people there to come out or give up control of the place.

example.ex: We must do everything possible to lift the siege...
example.tran: 我们必须尽一切可能解除包围。

example.ex: They are hopeful of bringing the siege to a peaceful conclusion...
example.tran: 他们希望能和平结束这次围困。

entry.tran: (警察、士兵、新闻记者等)包围，围住
entry.def: If police, soldiers, or journalists lay siege to a place, they surround it in order to force the people there to come out or give up control of the place.

example.ex: The rebels laid siege to the governor's residence...
The press laid siege to the club.

entry.tran: 遭受严厉批评;承受巨大压力
entry.def: If someone or something is under siege, they are being severely criticized or put under a great deal of pressure.

example.ex: The guy'll think he's under siege...
example.tran: 那家伙会认为他承受了巨大压力。

example.ex: Radio One is under siege from all sides.
example.tran: 广播一台受到了来自各方的严厉批评。

means.word_mean: 1. the action of an armed force that surrounds a fortified place and isolates it while continuing to attack

auth_sentence.content: The city had been under siege for three years.
auth_sentence.res_content: The city had been under siege for three years.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The city had been under siege for three years.

auth_sentence.content: Bringing food and weapons to an island under siege.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bringing food and weapons to an island under siege.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bringing food and weapons to an island under siege.

auth_sentence.content: Iraqi forces stormed the building and ended the siege.
auth_sentence.res_content: Iraqi forces stormed the building and ended the siege.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Iraqi forces stormed the building and ended the siege.

means.word_mean: 围攻; 围困; 围城(期间)

sentences.en: The enemy lay siege to the town in attempt to starve the people to death.
sentences.cn: 敌人围城, 企图将人们饿死。

jushi.english: The army laid siege to the town until the hungry citizen were forced to yield.
jushi.chinese: 军队围困着该城镇，直到饥饿的市民屈服为止。
